loginText: Welcome to the Static Dashboard! This project is built using React, MUI components, and JSON data to dynamically populate cards. You can explore different types of content such as charts, tables, blogs, and user profile management. Please log in to access your personalized dashboard and view interactive data visualizations.If you are new here, you can explore the dashboard to see pie charts, bar charts, line charts, data tables, and text-based blog cards. Manage your profile, change your password, or log out anytime using the sidebar controls. Enjoy a smooth, responsive UI experience across devices!
